data.message: Why am I blocked from liking anything?? Block the people bringing racism and hate to your social media platform!

replies.message: Hi Aletha. Facebook has policies in place to stop behavior that other people may find annoying or abusive. We've determined that you may have used a feature in a way that could be considered abusive, even if you didn't mean to. This could include liking too many items, too quickly. If you think you may have been blocked by mistake, you can file an appeal here: http://bit.ly/2z8LJdS. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2AayXsZ.   -Tenaya
So what you're saying is I'm being treated like a child?? And it's not a mistake, I like a lot of things on Facebook pages. Good call Facebook police
Why provide these options if you can't use them? Might as well delete them altogether if you think it's being abused. That makes no sense 😂😂
